static BMesh* BME_bevel_mesh ( BMesh *  bm,
float  value,
int   UNUSEDres,
int  options,
int   UNUSEDdefgrp_index,
BME_TransData_Head *  td 
) [static]

BME_bevel_mesh

Mesh beveling tool:

Bevels an entire mesh. It currently uses the flags of its vertices and edges to track topological changes. The parameter "value" is the distance to inset (should be negative). The parameter "options" is not currently used.

Returns - A BMesh pointer to the BM passed as a parameter.
